alert.note: Alert for Etowah (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 12:53AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Etowah County through 130 AM CDT... At 1253 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rainbow City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Rainbow City, Attalla, Hokes Bluff, Glencoe, Steele, Reece City, Ballplay, Tabor Road, Gadsden Mall, Noccalula Falls, Neely Henry Lake, Southside, Gadsden Steam Plant, Big Wills Creek, Crudup, Gadsden Municipal Airport, Keener, Rockledge and Black Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central and northeastern Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northeastern and east central Alabama.
